document_data.name: Bhaerlith
document_data.mainbody: '''Bhaerlith''' was the name of a secret, manufactured [[oasis]] located in the [[Anauroch]] desert.
document_data.Description: The oasis was rich with a variety of fruiting trees including [[palm]]s. Within the camp was a single underground stone structure used by the [[Zhentilar]] soldiers.
document_data.Geography: Bhaerlith was located in the northern region of [[the Sword]], just north of [[Elah'zad]] in the [[Hills of Scent]].
document_data.Defenses: Like other Zhent oases, Bhaerlith was protected by a ring of spring-sword traps that would harm any would bring great harm to any would-be trespassers or wandering wildlife. The remains of local [[Bedine]] tribespeople that did make it into the camp were displayed on wooden posts outside the perimeter as a warning.
document_data.History: During the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]] it served as an outpost for the Zhentilar army. It was used as a major way point for [[Zhent]] caravans crossing the desert to trade goods to and from [[Zhentil Keep]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Rumors stated that the oasis was haunted by a single [[guardian daemon]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The camp supported its contingent of Zhentilar soldiers, who were in turn given support by a cadre of Zhentarim [[spellcaster]]s.
